content: MCF MCF MCF MCF MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF bundle EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF Bundle EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF bundle EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF Bundle EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF bundle EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF Bundle EC stream MCL MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF MCF 426 IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ Technical Guide – Feature LIC: Activate using HMC function on a one feature (PCHID) at a time basis - disruptive: CONFIG FUNCTIONs mapped to the feature OFF to all LPARs, activate, and then CONFIG ON – RG LIC: Activate using HMC function to each RG in turn – disruptive to all PCHIDs in the RG: CONFIG all FUNCTIONs mapped to all PCHIDs in RG1 OFF, activate, then CONFIG ON. Repeat for all PCHIDs
